function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased risk of transmission due to non-contact interactions","Impact":"Higher likelihood of viral spread within the community","Mitigation":"Promote hygiene and ventilation measures, limit indoor gatherings","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, IoT sensors for occupancy monitoring","People":"Urban residents, community members","Owner":"Community leaders, local government"},{"Description":"Inadequate adaptation to changing needs of residents","Impact":"Reduced quality of life, dissatisfaction among residents","Mitigation":"Regular surveys and feedback collection, flexible zoning and infrastructure design","Technologies":"Smart city data analytics, community engagement platforms","People":"Urban residents, community planners","Owner":"City planning departments, community organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of coordination between physical and virtual elements in community planning","Impact":"Disruption of urban community order, decreased resilience","Mitigation":"Integrated planning for physical and digital spaces, collaboration between technology and urban planning experts","Technologies":"Digital twin technology, urban simulation software","People":"Urban residents, community planners, technology experts","Owner":"Urban planning departments, technology companies"}]}
